title: Electrochemical performance of a Li+-enriched metallohydrogel as electrolyte and electrode materials for supercapacitors
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00096J, Communication
Yeeshu Kumar, Moupia Mukherjee, Manish Kumar Dixit, Abul Kalam, Mrigendra Dubey
Li+-enriched metallohydrogel (MG-Co) has been synthesized via insitu LiOH deprotonation of pre-gelator (H9SAL) followed by coordination with Co2+ to develop pure gel electrolyte and electrode materials without using any external...
